allow:
Bash(python -c "
from PolyDiffusion.src.utils.sa_score import calculate_sa_score

# Test: What SA score does simple polymer get?
test_cases = [
    (''CCO'', ''ethanol - small molecule''),
    (''C'' * 10, ''simple alkane''),
    (''[*:1]CCC[*:2]'', ''polymer with anchors''),
    (''CCCC'', ''capped version (anchors->C)'')
]

for smiles, desc in test_cases:
    score = calculate_sa_score(smiles)
    print(f''{desc:30s} SMILES: {smiles:20s} SA_Score: {score:.3f}'')
")
